title: Stratagem: Journey to Nyorfias Book 3
description: In the wake of the enemy's masterfully executed surprise attack on Aurora Base, Easy Force endures a perilous march through a life-threatening storm. Sgt. Rett can take on any physical challenge -- but can she survive close combat with an alien superbeing on the battleground of her own mind?Series Reading Order: Convergence, Gravity, Stratagem, Carakenne, Kyarta Girl
author: Terry Roy
